description: Empowers the cyberpunk tracking device controller with advanced surveillance capabilities.
author: NeuroSec Dynamics

features.description: Integrates augmented reality (AR) overlay for real-time data visualization and analysis.
Incorporates biometric recognition for precise target identification and tracking.
Upgrades neural network algorithms for more accurate prediction of target movements and behavior.
Improved geo-fencing capabilities for dynamic and responsive virtual perimeters.
Enables seamless integration with surveillance drones for extended coverage and target tracking.
Introduces neuro-interfacing capabilities for direct control and manipulation of connected tracking devices.
